name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 4,1)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: FIFTHMEMBER

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 3,1)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: FOURTHMEMBER

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 0,1)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: FRISTMEMBER

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 1,1)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: SECONDMEMBER

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 5,1)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: SIXTHMEMBER

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.account order by t.`order` asc) from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id GROUP BY t.root)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: TEAMEMBERS

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 2,1)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: THIRDMEMBER

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`ACL`,
t1.`CANCELEDBY`,
t1.`CLOSEDBY`,
(select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 4,1) AS `FIFTHMEMBER`,
(select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 3,1) AS `FOURTHMEMBER`,
(select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 0,1) AS `FRISTMEMBER`,
t1.`ID`,
t1.`NAME`,
t1.`OPENEDBY`,
t1.PM AS `PM`,
t1.PO AS `PO`,
t1.QD AS `QD`,
t1.RD AS `RD`,
(select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 1,1) AS `SECONDMEMBER`,
(select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 5,1) AS `SIXTHMEMBER`,
(select GROUP_CONCAT(t.account order by t.`order` asc) from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id GROUP BY t.root) AS `TEAMEMBERS`,
(select t.account from zt_team t where t.type = 'project' and t.root = t1.id order by t.id asc LIMIT 2,1) AS `THIRDMEMBER`,
t1.`UPDATEBY`
FROM `zt_project` t1
